From: 
To:'
-  
CI
Subject: RE: Breaking News: A federal judge denied Jeffrey Epstein bail, rejecting his request to stay in his 
mansion under guard until his sex-trafficking trial. 
Date: Thu, 18 Jul 2019 23:19:28 +0000 
There should be two. He appealed twice. 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, July 18, 2019 6:58 PM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Breaking News: A federal judge denied Jeffrey Epstein bail, rejecting his request to stay in his mansion under 
guard until his sex-trafficking trial. 
I'll grab it, but thank you! 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, July 18, 2019 17:04 
To: 
Subject: Re: Breaking News: A federal judge denied Jeffrey Epstein bail, rejecting his request to stay in his mansion under 
guard until his sex-trafficking trial. 
Would you like me to get the EDNY filing? 
On Jul 18, 2019, at 4:11 PM, 
perfect thanks 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, July 18, 2019 14:08 
To: 
Subject: RE: Breaking News: A federal judge denied Jeffrey Epstein bail, rejecting his request to stay in his mansion 
under guard until his sex-trafficking trial. 
Attached. You should also get the Boustani appellate filing(s) from EDNY. I can do that if you'd like. 
From: 
I < 
Sent: Thursday, July 18, 2019 2:04 PM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Breaking News: A federal judge denied Jeffrey Epstein bail, rejecting his request to stay in his mansion 
under guard until his sex-trafficking trial. 
> 
wrote: 
Awesome, thank you 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, July 18, 2019 13:03 
To: 
Subject: Re: Breaking News: A federal judge denied Jeffrey Epstein bail, rejecting his request to stay in his mansion 
under guard until his sex-trafficking trial. 
EFTA00028155

Enjoy the appeal. (I have a sample opposition. So does EDNY in the Boustani case.) 
On Jul 18, 2019, at  12:50 PM, 
Thanks man 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, July 18, 2019 12:29 
To: 
Subject: FW: Breaking News: A federal judge denied Jeffrey Epstein bail, rejecting his request to stay in his mansion 
under guard until his sex-trafficking trial. 
wrote: 
Congratulations. 
From: The New York Times 
<nytdirect@nytimes.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 18, 2019 11:39 AM 
To: 
Subject: Breaking News: A federal judge denied Jeffrey Epstein bail, rejecting his request to stay in his mansion under 
guard until his sex-trafficking trial. 
he 
New 
York

The New York Times 
Breaking  News 
Alert 
July 18, 2019 
NYTimes.com 
BREAKING NEWS 
A federal judge denied Jeffrey 
Epstein bail, rejecting  his request to 
stay in his mansion under  guard until 
his sex-trafficking  trial. 
Thursday, July 18, 2019 11:38AM EST 
Mr. Epstein, the financier facing sex-trafficking charges, had requested to await trial under 
home detention at his Upper East Side mansion. 
The judge said Mr. Epstein, who owns property in Paris and has a private plane, would be 
detained in jail until his trial on charges that he sexually abused and trafficked dozens of 
EFTA00028156

underage girls in the early 2000s.
